meta.name: description
meta.content: Copium IDE is a revolutionary, block-based editor designed for the modern creator. Inspired by the simplicity of Scratch, Copium IDE empowers you to build games, applications, and even complex headless programs with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface. Forget frustrating syntax and boilerplate code; Copium IDE lets you focus purely on your logic and bring your ideas to life.
